TopicTitle: Changing Cockpit IVAs for OPT (de_IVA mod)

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, 

My first post here. 

I'm running the latest version of KSP1 with DE_IVA and it's dependencies along with OPT Spaceplane. 

I know that OPT Spaceplane cockpits have the same IVA panels etc, but curious if there is a simple way to change the interior of the cockpit to have a different layout that has more options, screens, buttons etc...

Thank you all in advance for any help here.

On 1/10/2024 at 2:07 AM, Noodlz said:

Not simple, no. Someone has to put the time and effort in to position props from an alternate IVA mod into the 3d model used for that cockpits internal and record their locations and rotation in a config file with a unique name, then the unique named internal config replaces the internal path in the cockpits config file so that the cockpit uses the new internal instead. All IVAs have to match specific co-ordinates so that they overlay with the cockpit correctly when you turn them on. Try swapping another models IVA into a different cockpit and you will see the overlay sitting in a weird place when you bring it up.
